description: Erection of first floor side extension and change of use to HMO.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

decision_conditions: The proposed total enlargement would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse and it would exceed 4 metres in height, it would have more than a single storey, have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse and it would be situated  within 2 metres of the boundary of the curtilage of the dwellinghouse and the height of the eaves of the enlarged part would exceed 3 metres, in conflict with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, Paragraphs A.1(i), (ja), (j)(i),(j)(ii),(j)(iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Due to limited and imprecise information submitted, it is considered, that it has not been demonstrated that the proposed change of use of the dwellinghouse to small House in Multiple Occupation would be lawful under Class L of Part 3 of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
